attributes.action: strongly oppose the propsal that MPs should be exempt from the freedom of information act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These MPs are the same MPs who approve legislation for such matters as dealing with terrorism and the reform of the House of Lords. So are there going to be exemptions for certain types of terrorists, just like there will be exemptions for a certain type of public servant?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
